meanings.definition: relating to or located in the diaphysis of a bone
meanings.sent1: The diaphyseal region of the bone is where growth occurs.
meanings.sent2: Doctors examined the diaphyseal area to assess the bone's health.
meanings.sent3: The diaphyseal part of the bone decided to throw a party for the other bone parts.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the diaphyseal structure of a bone.
meanings.sent5: The diaphyseal aspect of the bone stood out like a sturdy pillar.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the shaft of a long bone
meanings.sent1: The diaphyseal portion of the bone provides support.
meanings.sent2: Injuries to the diaphyseal area can affect bone strength.
meanings.sent3: The diaphyseal bone section decided to take up knitting as a hobby.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as unyielding as a diaphyseal bone.
meanings.sent5: The diaphyseal structure of the bone resembled a sturdy column.
